Description: The ethereum endpoint, you can get one from providers like Infura and Alchemy
Private key of the account to be used to sign the transaction
The token contract, you can find the contract for the token you want to transfer on etherscan
The Injective Chain address to receive the funds
The body of the message to send to Injective chain to do the deposit
Number of decimals in Injective chain of the token being transferred (default: 18)
